altername_name: Jet Set Willy: Maria vs Some Bastards
name: Maria vs. Some Bastards
overview: Someone's kidnapped Willy and his housekeeper Maria has to pay the kidnappers the amount of items the 256 items they are demanding. One of the more 'out-there' JSW mods available (which is saying something...) the game is littered with bad language - somewhat given away by the needlessly aggressive title! If you're easily offended, you might want to give this one a miss. The game itself has some unusual features for a Jet Set Willy game. Obviously you play as Maria rather than Willy himself and she is too tough to die from falling from heights - this dramatically changes the gameplay and how you approach situations. Also, some of the bad guys can be touched while others can't. There's a load of secrets throughout the rooms and the game does not play like your usual Jet Set Willy hack.
